mapper.sql: id, org, per_name, per_tel, per_addr, addr, code, cont_name, cont_tel, status, start, end
mapper.select: SELECT id, org, per_name , per_tel, per_addr, addr , code, cont_name, cont_tel , status, start, end FROM t_pack WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, org, per_name , per_tel, per_addr, addr , code, cont_name, cont_tel , status, start, end FROM t_pack WHERE per_tel = #{tel}
